name: Anomaly Investigations
storyline: Dive into the depths of Anomaly Investigations, where you step into the shoes of a "volunteer" investigator tasked with unraveling the secrets of a mysterious underground hallway. Delve into the heart of the unknown as you navigate through a seemingly endless corridors, each time uncovering new anomalies and unexplained phenomena. With every loop, the truth inches closer, challenging your wit and determination and observational skills in this dangerous journey of discovery and intrigue.
summary: It's a game that's inspired by The Exit 8 which is an evolution of games like Observation Duty. It's a little atmospheric and creepy, but not too scary. You need to traverse the location and remember how things were, each loop through the location, things can change. Sometimes the change is super obvious, sometimes super subtle. Sometimes there's no change at all!
